episodes.title: VERDICT: Doomsday Cult Mom Trial — AZ v. Lori Vallow Daybell — Day 6
episodes.description:
"Doomsday Cult" mom Lori Vallow Daybell was convicted for the murders of her daughter, Tylee, and son, JJ in Idaho. Earlier this year in Arizona, she was also convicted of orchestrating the murder of her fourth husband, Charles Vallow. Now, also in Arizona, she's on trial for allegedly attempting to have her niece’s husband murdered, whose name is Brandon Boudreaux. She was indicted on a conspiracy to commit murder charge. 

Subscribe to Law&Crime Trials for More Courtroom Coverage: https://bit.ly/LawAndCrimeTrials

#LoriVallow #TrueCrime #LawAndCrime

episodes.title: Charles Vallow Was Scared For His Life Before He Died: Sister
episodes.description:
Kay Woodcock, Charles Vallow’s sister, took the stand on Thursday. She discussed the relationship her brother Charles and Lori had. She said the family knew something was off between the two in 2018. Charles also told her that he was afraid for his safety.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow’s Former Friend Recalls Talk About ‘Zombies’ During Girls Trip
episodes.description:
As the trial against Lori Vallow continued on Thursday afternoon, her former friend Sarena Sharpe took the stand to detail the communication she had with Vallow after learning that her husband, Charles Vallow, had been found dead. Sharpe said they had limited contact following Charles’ death but recalled previous conversations during a girls' trip in which Lori referred to zombies—something that concerned Sharpe.

episodes.title: Witness Fires Back at Lori Daybell During Heated Testimony: ‘Don’t Flatter Yourself’
episodes.description:
Nancy Jo Hancock, a woman who had been communicating with Charles Vallow on an LDS website, continued her testimony on Wednesday afternoon, where she was questioned by defendant Lori Daybell. Lori pressed Hancock, claiming she believed the two frequently talked about her before Charles’ death. Hancock fired back, saying, “Don’t flatter yourself.”

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Fires Back at State in Hearing Over Witnesses
episodes.description:
"Doomsday Cult" mom Lori Vallow raised her voiced at the state for its attempts to limit her witnesses during her trial. Vallow claimed that the defense has thoroughly prepared and that excluding witnesses would deny her the right to a fair defense. She accused the prosecution of trying to stifle her ability to present her case effectively.

episodes.description:
Lori Vallow Daybell was seen getting heated with the judge on Tuesday during a pretrial hearing on multiple motions. She argued with the judge over interrogation and police video involving Alex Cox and her slain daughter, Tylee, believing that both were under immense pressure from the situation, including from the police.

episodes.title: Bizarre Text Messages Between 'Doomsday Cult' Duo Shown to Jury
episodes.description:
Investigator Nicholas Edwards took the stand on Wednesday afternoon in the Chad Daybell trial where he breaks down the text messages that were shared between Chad Daybell and Lori Vallow, the couple that has been accused of murdering Vallow’s two kids, as well as other murders. The text messages show the seemingly loving couple exchanging texts revealing their love for one another.

episodes.title: 'Doomsday Cult' Duo Made Wedding Plans Before Tammy Daybell's Death: FBI
episodes.description:
A FBI tactical specialist presented evidence that the "Doomsday Cult" duo Chad and Lori Daybell were planning a wedding while Chad's first wife, Tammy, was still alive. Chad is on trial for the deaths of his first wife and Lori's two kids, JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan in 2019.

episodes.title: Friend of ‘Doomsday Cult’ Couple Recalls Day She Learned of Tammy Daybell’s Murder
episodes.description:
Whitney Arnold took the witness stand Friday morning in an Idaho court room during the trial of Chad Daybell. Whitney and her husband Ron were friends of Tammy and Chad Daybell. During her testimony, Whitney recalls the moment she found out her friend had died, saying she was ‘shocked’.

episodes.title: Concerning Text Messages From 'Doomsday Cult' Couple Released
episodes.description:
Former FBI special agent Douglas Hart took the stand on Friday afternoon in Chad Daybell's trial to give his testimony, detailing a particular text thread between Lori and an alleged friend discussing "what's really going on" after Lori expressed excitement about confiding in this person. Hart stated that this specific text string concerned him.

episodes.title: ‘Doomsday Cult’ Couple Believed Lori Vallow’s Ex-Husband Was Possessed: Best Friend
episodes.description:
Melanie Gibb, former best friend of Lori Vallow, took the stand on Thursday morning to detail what she remembers from both Lori and Charles Vallow’s marriage, the murder of Charles, and the events that took place after Lori and Chad Daybell became a couple. Vallow also allegedly told Gibb that she believed her husband was a dark spirit, and possessed.

#ChadDaybell #LoriVallow #LawAndCrime

episodes.title: ‘Doomsday Cult’ Prophet Trial: Never Before Seen Footage Revealed
episodes.description:
The trial of Chad Daybell continued Monday morning with never before seen dashcam footage being revealed to jurors. The video shows Daybell sitting in the back of a cop car, talking to his daughter, Emma, before being taken into custody. Chad is heard giving Emma passwords to his bank accounts, where to find cash, and tells her “I’m not coming back”. Daybell is the husband of “doomsday cult” mom Lori Vallow Daybell, and is on trial for allegedly conspiring with Vallow to murder his late wife, Tammy Daybell, as well as two of Vallow’s children, Tylee Ryan and Joshua Vallow.

#ChadDaybell #LoriVallow #MurderTrial #LawAndCrime

episodes.title: ‘Doomsday Cult’ Jailhouse Call Between Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell Played in Court
episodes.description:
The trial of Chad Daybell continued Monday morning with Detective Vincent Kaaiakamanu from the Fremont Sheriff’s Office taking the stand to testify. During his testimony, a June 9, 2020 phone call Lori Vallow Daybell made from prison to Chad Daybell was played. Chad Daybell is on trial for the murders of two of Lori’s children, along with the conspiring to commit murder on Chad’s late wife. Lori Vallow Daybell was already convicted of all of the same charges.

#ChadDaybell #MurderTrial #LawAndCrime

episodes.title: ‘Doomsday Cult’ Mom Lori Vallow Manipulated Chad Daybell: Defense
episodes.description:
Opening statements started Wednesday morning in the trial of Chad Daybell. Defense Attorney John Prior delivered a statement saying Lori Vallow was a “very sexual, very manipulative person,” who “knows how to get what she wants.“Daybell, the husband of “doomsday cult” mom Lori Vallow Daybell, faces trial for allegedly conspiring with his wife to murder his first wife, Tammy Daybell, as well as two of Lori’s children, Tylee Ryan and Joshua Vallow. Chad Daybell faces multiple charges including first-degree murder and conspiracy to commit first-degree murder. If convicted, Chad Daybell could be sentenced to death.

#ChadDaybell #DoomsdayCult #LawAndCrime

episodes.title: ‘Final Chapter’: Chad Daybell’s Alleged Murders Detailed in ‘Doomsday Cult’ Trial Opening Statement
episodes.description:
After five days of jury selection, opening statements in the trial of Chad Daybell took place Wednesday morning. State Prosecutor Rob Wood delivered a passionate statement to the Idaho court room, emphasizing to the jury, “Your verdict will be the link that writes the final chapter of this saga”. Daybell, the husband of “doomsday cult” mom Lori Vallow Daybell, faces trial for allegedly conspiring with his wife to murder his first wife, Tammy Daybell, as well as two of Lori’s children, Tylee Ryan and Joshua Vallow. Chad Daybell faces multiple charges including first-degree murder and conspiracy to commit first-degree murder. If convicted, Chad Daybell could be sentenced to death.

#ChadDaybell #DoomsdayCult #LawAndCrime
